contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 19, 2016 D NLB Network Band Contest
NLB Network Band Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
nlb-network-band-contest
None
St Giles-without-Cripplegate Church, London, UK Hosted by North London Brass.
Entertainment Contest comprised of North London Brass Network Bands. Each band will choose to perform a hymn tune, a march and a free-choice entertainments piece.
Best March: 1. NLB Putney & Wandsworth 2. NLB Muswell Hill
Best Hymn Tune: 1. NLB Putney & Wandsworth 2. NLB City of London
Best Own Choice 1. NLB Putney & Wandsworth 2. NLB Enfield Chase
Sept. 23, 2016, 7:39 p.m. Oct. 27, 2016, 12:29 p.m.
1 NLB Putney & Wandsworth Sam Topp
2 NLB Muswell Hill Martin Thomson
3 NLB City of London David Stoneham
3 NLB Enfield Chase Paul Hooper
